title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4026.4 - Data to be declared
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4026.4 - Data to be declared

State Regulations

All statements of partnerships, of sales with
contingencies, of leases of designation of managing owner, or of arrangements, shall declare the name of the managing owner; or when a partnership is the
managing owner, the name of the managing partner who shall be the only person
to whom winnings are payable (which must be the name of the nominator), in
whose name the horse will run and with whom rests the power of
entry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4026.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
